SalesOrder Update Item - 10 Test BAdI check_item

item.description:
The following logic must be present in the following three BAdIs for the CC user in the official test system:

SD_SLS_CHECK_HEAD

if salesdocument-purchaseorderbycustomer = 'save_despite_error---check_head' and salesdocument-createdbyuser = 'CC0000000013'.
append value #(  messagetype = 'E' messagetext = 'Save despite of an error message....' ) to messages.
endif.


SD_SLS_CHECK_ITEM
if salesdocument-purchaseorderbycustomer = 'save_despite_error---check_item' and salesdocument-createdbyuser = 'CC0000000013'.
append value #(  messagetype = 'E' messagetext = 'Save despite of an error message....' ) to messages.
endif.

SD_SLS_CHECK_BEFORE_SAVE
if salesdocument-purchaseorderbycustomer = 'do_not_save---check_before_save' and salesdocument-createdbyuser = 'CC0000000013'.
append value #(  messagetype = 'E' messagetext = 'Do not save because of an error message....' ) to messages.
endif.

item.name: Sales Order Bulk Request In CRUD

body.raw:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:pm="http://www.getpostman.com/">
    <soapenv:Header></soapenv:Header>
    <soapenv:Body>
        <n0:SalesOrderBulkRequest xmlns:n0="http://sap.com/xi/SD-SLS" xmlns:n1="http://SAPCustomFields.com/YY1_A2A">
            <MessageHeader>
                <CreationDateTime>2018-06-28T12:01:15.1234567Z</CreationDateTime>
                <SenderBusinessSystemID>SD_API_TEST</SenderBusinessSystemID>
                <SenderParty>
				</SenderParty>
            </MessageHeader>
            <SalesOrder 
    	actionCode = '01'
    	itemListCompleteTransmissionIndicator = 'true'
    	pricingElementListCompleteTransmissionIndicator = 'false'
    	partnerListCompleteTransmissionIndicator = 'false'
    	paymentPlanItemListCompleteTransmissionIndicator = 'true'>
                <ExternalDocumentID>{{ExternalDocumentID}}</ExternalDocumentID>
                <ExternalDocLastChangeDateTime>2018-06-28T12:02:01.1234567Z</ExternalDocLastChangeDateTime>
                <SalesOrderType>TA</SalesOrderType>
                <SalesOrganization>1010</SalesOrganization>
                <DistributionChannel>10</DistributionChannel>
                <OrganizationDivision>00</OrganizationDivision>
                <PurchaseOrderByCustomer>{{PurchaseOrderByCustomer}}</PurchaseOrderByCustomer>
                <n1:YY1_TestAutoHCodeList>101</n1:YY1_TestAutoHCodeList>
                <n1:YY1_TestAutoHText>XT_H_TEST</n1:YY1_TestAutoHText>
                <n1:YY1_TestAutoHNumText>111</n1:YY1_TestAutoHNumText>
                <n1:YY1_TestAutoHAmount currencyCode='EUR'>99.12</n1:YY1_TestAutoHAmount>
                <n1:YY1_TestAutoHBusObj>1010</n1:YY1_TestAutoHBusObj>
                <n1:YY1_TestAutoHChkBox>true</n1:YY1_TestAutoHChkBox>
                <n1:YY1_TestAutoHEmail>testhead@sap.com</n1:YY1_TestAutoHEmail>
                <n1:YY1_TestAutoHNumber>888.11</n1:YY1_TestAutoHNumber>
                <n1:YY1_TestAutoHPhone>+49123456789</n1:YY1_TestAutoHPhone>
                <n1:YY1_TestAutoHQuantity unitCode="PCE">100.32</n1:YY1_TestAutoHQuantity>
                <n1:YY1_TestAutoHTime>14:10:07</n1:YY1_TestAutoHTime>
                <n1:YY1_TestAutoHTimeStamp>2020-02-20T01:01:01.1234567Z</n1:YY1_TestAutoHTimeStamp>

                scheduleLineListCompleteTransmissionIndicator = 'false'

                    <RequestedQuantity unitCode="PCE">5</RequestedQuantity>
                    <Material>TG0012</Material>

                    <n1:YY1_TestAutoIText>XT_I_TEST</n1:YY1_TestAutoIText>
                    <n1:YY1_TestAutoINumText>111</n1:YY1_TestAutoINumText>

</soapenv:Envelope>
